subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: China’s basketball administration has handed out a record fine of 330,000 yuan ($48,290) to two clubs and five players for a brawl during a playoff game last Sunday. China’s attempt to bring more contact into the domestic game has resulted in an increase in on-court violence and more fines from the governing body, officials said. The noncontact style previously prevalent in the league was criticized for producing players not tough enough for the international game.
